BBEX3.A.BTN.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Bhutan / USD 1 = BTN ... (middle)
General: The Indian rupee is likewise legal tender alongside the Bhutanese ngultrum (convertible at par).
Source: Since March 2010: Bhutan National Bank Limited, Thimphu. 1994 - February 2010: Royal Monetary Authority of Bhutan, Thimphu.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates (from 1994 to 2002 and since February 2010 on the basis of the buying and selling rates).
